description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at the time Microsoft took a company known as Lindows to court. While one would think they'd have an easy win, this situation caused them to settle and give the people they accused a massive payout or risk them changing the name of their biggest product and trademark forever. This is the story of Microsoft v Lindows! Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Microsoft Took A $20 Million L…
